mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Cover letter for letter to Short from M. Jean Armand Tronchin-Labat; mentions that Minister of Justice M. de Lamoignon was replaced by Monsr. Barentin; Brittany deputies have been released as well as M. d'Epremesnil and Abbe Guillaume Sabatier; speculates that Parliament will be recalled that week.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Jefferson, Thomas, 1743-1826--Correspondence
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, 1788 September 24, Paris, [France] to [William] Short, Geneva, [Switzerland].
